targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND hostname=~ /^$HOST$/ AND "name" !~ /^*_usage$/ AND ("unit" = 'percent' OR "unit" = 'rpm')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("role" != 'cube' AND "host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "unit" = 'degrees_c') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND ("path" = '/' OR "path" = '\\C:')) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("resp") FROM "def"."ipmi_sensor" WHERE ("name" = 'ping_checker' AND "hostname" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ip"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_iowait") AS "iowait" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") AS "total", mean("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND ("path" = '/' OR "path" = '\\C:')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "interface" =~ /^$IFACES$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_recv"), 1s) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("drop_in")) AS "in", non_negative_difference(mean("drop_out")) AS "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST' AND "interface" =~ /^$IFACES$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write", non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("write_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("writes")) AS "write", non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) / non_negative_difference(mean("reads")) AS "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '$HOST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ipmi_sensor" WITH KEY = "hostname"
list.label: Host
list.name: HOST
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ipmi_sensor" WITH KEY = "hostname"
